commit_list.message:
Updated HDBC.cabal for GHC 6.8

The base package split-up requires explicit dependencies on modules, such as bytestring and old-time.  This patch should keep HDBC compatible with both previous and current versions of GHC.

markdown2pdf: Fix issue reading log with non-UTF8 characters.

Replaced 'UTF8.readFile logFile' with 'liftM toString $ BS.readFile logFile'

Updated HDBC.cabal for GHC 6.8

The base package split-up requires explicit dependencies on modules, such as bytestring and old-time.  This patch should keep HDBC compatible with both previous and current versions of GHC.

Use variable for certificates directory

The certificates directory was hardcoded.  Fixed to use the
existing 'ssl_certs_dest_dir' variable.
commit_list.repo_description: Ansible playbook to deploy SSL certs/keys

commit_list.message:
Initial implementation of circuit breaker

- Use STM for circuit breaker state.
- Use an MVar lock to ensure only one action is allowed when in
  half-open status.

Revert to old definition of hGetContents

This is a fix by Jeff Polakow and Gershom Bazerman to fix Handler.hs under GHC 6.12.2, due to a change in ByteStrings.  This falls back to the old definition of hGetContents until ByteStrings is reverted.  The ticket related to this issue can be found at:

http://hackage.haskell.org/trac/ghc/ticket/3808

markdown2pdf: Fix issue reading log with non-UTF8 characters.

Replaced 'UTF8.readFile logFile' with 'liftM toString $ BS.readFile logFile'

Replaced 'UTF8.readFile logFile' with 'liftM toString $ BS.readFile logFile'

This is a fix by Jeff Polakow and Gershom Bazerman to fix Handler.hs under GHC 6.12.2, due to a change in ByteStrings.  This falls back to the old definition of hGetContents until ByteStrings is reverted.  The ticket related to this issue can be found at:

http://hackage.haskell.org/trac/ghc/ticket/3808

Replace "contagious" with "contiguous"

- Also fix a small typo in "necessary"

commit_list.message:
Revert to old definition of hGetContents

This is a fix by Jeff Polakow and Gershom Bazerman to fix Handler.hs under GHC 6.12.2, due to a change in ByteStrings.  This falls back to the old definition of hGetContents until ByteStrings is reverted.  The ticket related to this issue can be found at:

http://hackage.haskell.org/trac/ghc/ticket/3808

markdown2pdf: Fix issue reading log with non-UTF8 characters.

Replaced 'UTF8.readFile logFile' with 'liftM toString $ BS.readFile logFile'

Updated HDBC-sqlite3.cabal

* This change should make HDBC-sqlite3 build under the new base package split-up.  It requires Cabal version >= 1.2.

Implement 'downloadFile'

Provide a function for downloading the contents of a responseBody
to a file.

This repo is deprecated, use req instead

commit_list.message:
Use const instead of (\_ -> )

Replace occurrences of the form (\_ -> ) with the constant function.
Update README with instructions for Windows
Enumerate extra-libraries to compile on Windows

Added benchmark and checks files

Benchmark code compares performance of String, ByteStrings, and
Iteratees for counting the number of characters in
/usr/share/dict/words.

Added source files

Created a module for lists and another for ByteStrings

Update to libsvm 3.1

* Include libsvm with the package
* Drop dependency on pkg-config
